name: Lightweight
description: Move faster while sprinting and take no damage when falling.

name: Skulker
description: Move faster while crouched and prone.

name: Cold Blooded
description: AI Scorestreaks and Hawk tagging will be delayed when targeting you. Player-controlled scorestreaks will not highlight you with a target reticle. Immune to Thermal. K-9 unit and seeker have reduced detection range against you.

name: Gun-Ho
description: Fire your weapon and use equipment while sprinting, recover from sprint faster. Move at full speed when reloading.

name: Dexterity
description: Mantle, cimb, slide, and swap weapons faster. Increased weapon accuracy when jumping or mantling.
